body_html:
This page mentions the "Userspace Mitigations" separate from the host kernel:
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/KnowledgeBase/SpectreAndMeltdown

I can't believe I didn't think of apt-get update && apt-get upgrade in the downstream image to address the issue, simple. Sorry for the noise.
body_text:
This page mentions the "Userspace Mitigations" separate from the host kernel:
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/KnowledgeBase/SpectreAndMeltdown
I can't believe I didn't think of apt-get update && apt-get upgrade in the downstream image to address the issue, simple.  Sorry for the noise.
body:
This page mentions the "Userspace Mitigations" separate from the host kernel:
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/KnowledgeBase/SpectreAndMeltdown

I can't believe I didn't think of `apt-get update && apt-get upgrade` in the downstream image to address the issue, simple.  Sorry for the noise.
